header.name: Branden Vennes
header.summary: API and backend solutions engineer with 6 years of experience. Develops high-quality and robust software solutions using a variety of tools including object-oriented and functional languages, SQL and NoSQL databases, and event-driven paradigms. A strong knowledge of cloud best-practices and a history of deploying dozens of applications to live environments. AWS cloud practitioner certified. Expertise in Scala, Java, Go, Python, and TypeScript.
